title: Error loading my clubs
body: So i got this error for very long time now,the club I am in now is CrossRiderz,the people in club can see me there but me on my client cant,so if there is a way to fix it or something..

replies.body: There may have been a syncing issue with your club, and I'd like to take a look and try to get it refreshed for you.  Unfortunately, I wasn't able to locate the club.  :/  Can you verify both the name and tag for me?   Otherwise, you can also hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can review it individually with you there.  Let me know!
Well the club name is right Crossriderz,try if you can find it with tag xCRSx
If cant if you could erase all my.clubs or try to refresh like from the first when clibs started so i can be invited aggain or something
Thanks! I was able to locate the club, and attempted to refresh.  You're not the owner of the club, but you do appear to be in it.  Make sure to relog, and let me know if everything looks okay now.
Yep it works now thank you very much
